title: Plat2 ADC LFT

embed.title: Nyubrix - Summoner Stats - League of Legends
embed.description: Nyubrix / Platinum 2 0LP / 144W 146L Win Ratio 50% / Kai'Sa - 51W 48L Win Ratio 52%, Vayne - 35W 34L Win Ratio 51%, Xayah - 29W 35L Win Ratio 45%, Ezreal - 18W 31L Win Ratio 37%, Tristana - 18W 18L Win Ratio 50%

body:
Hey guys, my aim is to tryhard and play competetively in a team. I have played almost every adc for atleast quite some time. Im a marksman only player and im not willing to play mages/bruisers bot. 

IGN: Nyubrix
Rank: Plat2
Peak: D4
Main: ADC (preferences right now: Xayah, Jhin,  Trist, Sivir, Kaisa, Lucian) (of course i will practice the other marksmen if theres need for them) 
I play league since season 4.

Personal: 
First Name: Till
Age: 18
Languages: German, English

Availability:
Unfortunately i have to work a lot right now, so on workdays im only available for 1-2 hours in the evening.
Mon: 8:30pm - 10pm
Tue-Thu: 8pm - 10pm
Fri: 9pm - 12am
Sat: 8am - 12am
Sun: 8am - 9pm

On the weekend i try to not completely destroy my sleeping schedule. Occasionally there might be some social activities that get on the way. 


If you team/orga is interested, just add me ingame or message me here. 
See attachments for my op.gg.
